# safeAreaLayoutGuide

**Instance Property**

The layout guide you use to position content inside your view’s safe area.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var safeAreaLayoutGuide: NSLayoutGuide { get }
```

## Discussion

The layout guide in this property reflects the view’s frame minus its safe area insets. Use this guide to configure layout rules relative to this safe area.

## Respecting the View’s Safe Area

- **safeAreaRect**: A rectangle in the view’s coordinate system that contains the unobscured portion of the view.
- **safeAreaInsets**: The distances from the edges of your view that define the safe area.
- **additionalSafeAreaInsets**: Custom insets that you specify to modify your view’s safe area
